name: HacktoHabit
0:
”Alexa tell hack or habit to find me a new life hack”
”Let's do a quick review of my saved hacks”
”Let's save that hack for later”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hack or habit
des: Hack To Habit randomly selects posts from r/LifeProTips to read to the user. If you find some you like, save them to your list. Alexa will remind you of life hacks you have saved on a regular basis to keep it fresh in your mind.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
